tool_description: Calculates completion percentages and remaining targets for active reading goals based on current progress data.

goal_id.description: Unique identifier of the goal to calculate progress for

error_messages: Goal not found: The specified goal_id does not exist or is not active
Invalid current_date: Must be a valid date-time string in ISO 8601 format
Goal not started: The current_date is before the goal start date
usage: Provide goal_id and current_date to calculate progress. The tool will return completion percentages, remaining targets, and projected completion dates.

remaining_target.description: Amount remaining to complete the goal

days_remaining.description: Days left in the goal period

on_track.description: Whether progress is on track to meet the goal

projected_completion.description: Estimated completion date based on current pace
